title: Cinnamon Rolls with Cream Cheese Icing
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons warm water', '50g butter, melted', '50g instant vanilla dessert, such as Angel Delight', '250ml warm milk', '1 egg, room temperature', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '550g bread flour', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '50g butter, softened', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '4 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '75g chopped pecans', '115g cream cheese, softened', '50g butter, softened', '120g icing sugar sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/2 teaspoons milk']
